 Nightstrike::
Nightstrike jumped, avoiding the shot and he transformed to his trasmetal -hawk mode; he used his craws against Darkf Rat, trying to grab him.
  Tankor <lordofdarkness11001@...> wrote: ::Dark Rat::
4 of rthe shots hit him and he uses his blaster again
--- airly2000@... wrote:
> Nightstrike::
> 
> Nightstrike dogged the shot "Benniger"replied Nightstrike "Come back 
> to your den rat, this is a warrior's tournament and just true 
> warriors can stay here"
> 
> His boomerangs came back, and his assault machine gun with exploting 
> bullets appeared and he open fire against Dark Rat (14 shots)
>
